title: Silver 1 ADC Looking for Support Duo
body:
add ign: Ðean

must use voice chat

replies.body:
Least tell them that they also must be female. 
~Sincerely, a support main you deleted right away after finding out he was a guy.
Lmao, ill play with you. it doesnt matter whether your a boy or a girl i just wanna play league hahahaha.
Support is my second best role. And our names are based similar??
